title: Riot OCE Internships?
body:
Hi. I'm a second year animation university student at UTS and am looking for an opportunity to intern at Riot Games OCE. I've scoured the internet but mainly found information for the headquarters at LA and others instead, nothing for Sydney. I also can't seem to contact the page on facebook through messenger [seems its been de-activated] nor is there an email supplied anywhere for the OCE Riot headquarters. As is, it seems theres nothing going on but it wouldn't hurt to ask!

So my question is, is there any plans for an internship at the OCE office or some program of the sort?

Hope someone sees this!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: To the best of my understanding, only NA does internships. Ultimately, that's where all the dev happens.
Also because elsewhere unpaid internships are completely illegal.
Programmer position is a maybe, but any creative field is over in the main branch. Over here i think their responsibilities is bug fixing and customer service related events for the region.
